column5: This restful room on the second floor is perfect for a single person or couple. The room includes a full bed, nightstand, spacious chest of drawers, love seat, and closet. It also includes access to a shared bathroom with Jacuzzi bathtub.  Our guests have access to a large kitchen, refrigerator (used exclusively by Airbnb guests), dining room, living room, billiard room, library, study, and scenic backyard as well as DVDs, CDs, records, books and board games.
column8: Peaceful Retreat in Lovely Home near The Woodlands
